sentences.en: a hankering for a wealthy lifestyle
A wealthy businessman has been found bludgeoned to death.
sentences.cn: 一位富商被发现死于重物连续猛击。

sentences.en: A wealthy businessman has stood bail for him.
sentences.cn: 一位富商为他做了保证人.

sentences.en: Although she was wealthy, she lived in an unpretentious house.
sentences.cn: 她虽然富有, 住的却是朴素的房子.
他靠自己的努力而致富。

sentences.en: It is a misconception that Peggy was fabulously wealthy.
sentences.cn: 人们误以为佩吉相当有钱。

sentences.en: Mr. James had had a scattering of very wealthy friends.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯先生已经结交了两三个豪门朋友。

sentences.en: My brother is now very wealthy.
She had contracted an alliance with a wealthy man of rank.
sentences.cn: 她和一位有身份的富人联姻.

sentences.en: That young man was the son of a wealthy planter.
sentences.cn: 那年轻人是一位富有的农场主的儿子.

sentences.en: The best education should not be available only to the wealthy.
sentences.cn: 不应该只有富人才能得到最好的教育。

sentences.en: The couple are said to be fabulously wealthy.
sentences.cn: 据说这对夫妇家财万贯。

sentences.en: the wealthy nations of the world
They were, by and large, a very wealthy, privileged elite.
sentences.cn: 他们基本上是一些非常有钱有势的精英。
这是个非常有钱的家庭.

sentences.en: Wealthy tourists are tempting targets for bag snatchers.
sentences.cn: 富有的游客很容易成为抢包贼的目标。

trans.tran_en: having a lot of money, possessions etc
The wealthy are people who are wealthy
